main.text: We create wonderful and immersive digital adventure experiences

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: We have been building high-quality website and application design for more than 5 years
about.content: Xeno Xetrum has been operating in the digital market since 2018. We started with SEO website promotion and contextual advertising, and today we develop and implement comprehensive Internet marketing solutions, including digital strategies. Only a strong team can work with such a variety of topics and tools and consistently achieve results. The agency's staff includes more than 700 employees, including optimizers, programmers, specialists in the field of UX, SMM and reputation management, and professional editors. Xeno Xetrum offices are located in Moscow, Voronezh, Tula and Tambov.

responses.title: what are we doing
responses.subtitle: We provide a full range of solutions for your digital business on a turnkey basis
responses.strategy_text: We will help you draw up a business plan, develop a product development strategy and turn your goals into reality.
responses.grow_text: We will conduct research and analysis of your digital product, update your web resources and adjust your marketing strategy to increase business efficiency.
responses.development_text: We will develop selling websites or an effective web application, help automate business processes and integrate with other information systems.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of web design services including:

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: We have worked with brands such as:
portfolio.text: We rebranded the design of technology cards. Increased brand awareness.
portfolio.content: I recently purchased product cards from Demix and they exceeded all my expectations! The workmanship is at the highest level, each card is carefully and clearly executed. They have been a godsend for my business, making the process of organizing items easier and improving the appearance. Thanks to cards from Demix, I was able to easily manage my inventory, improve reporting and increase work efficiency. They are easy to use and feature-rich, making them an ideal choice for entrepreneurs like me. I recommend Demix product cards to anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality solution to improve their business!
